movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: A special effects-driven bore.
review:
In brief, 'The Phantom Menace' is a Muppet movie, without the charm.  The 'human' performances are, for the most part, worse than a bad read through of a script,  with the kid being the best of the lot.
The movie does succeed on one front though.  After all, it is a motion picture, and to that end, it is filled with useless, tiresome, but colorful, motion.
